attributes.action: parties to offer alternative candidates if brexit forces a general election
attributes.additional_details: constituencies nationally voted 2:1 to leave this is not reflected in the house.
attributes.background: if a general election is called there is no facility for voters to change the attitude of parliament, we would just get a different mix of the same people  to allow voters a real choice two candidates existing + a new should be put forward to allow a proper choice.

rejection.details: This petition is calling for action from political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
